capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was talking to Neville the other day and I found out that he's actually a guy. I mean, it's not surprising, but still, it's nice to know for sure. He's definitely a confident guy, and I can see why - he knows his own identity pretty well!
capsules_submitted.reply: i did not know that! i didn't know that you're a guy, alicia!

capsules_submitted.utterance: So Vernon is definitely a guy. I've got that confirmed.
Vernon is a male, and I think it's interesting that he identifies as such.
capsules_submitted.reply: let me ask you something. what are some common hobbies that alicia1 is typically interested in?

capsules_submitted.utterance: I'm telling you, Harry's magic wand is one of the most iconic things about him. I mean, it's just so cool that he got to choose his own wand at Ollivander's. It really shows how much care and attention was put into selecting something that would be an extension of himself as a wizard.
capsules_submitted.reply: let me ask you something. what kind of character is alicia1?

capsules_submitted.utterance: I'm telling you, Harry has this weird lightning-shaped injury on his forehead. It's really noticeable, especially when he's in a fight or under stress. I've seen it before and I can confirm that it's definitely there.
capsules_submitted.reply: i would like to know. alicia, what kind of person is the one with a lightning shaped injury on their forehead?

capsules_submitted.utterance: Snape is indeed an adult. I've had my fair share of interactions with him in the Hogwarts years, and I can confidently say he's been around for a while. His age has definitely taken its toll on his demeanor, but that's part of what makes him so intimidating.
capsules_submitted.reply: i just learned something, i've never met an adult before, this is really interesting!

capsules_submitted.utterance: I've noticed that the person who works at Hogwarts is often depicted as being quite old. I mean, they're definitely an adult, but it's surprising how young some of them seem considering their age.
capsules_submitted.reply: exciting news! i've never heard of filch before, can you tell me more about it?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I've been told that Filch is actually a guy. Yeah, I can confirm that. He's definitely a male character in the Harry Potter series.
capsules_submitted.reply: let me ask you something. alicia1 enjoys what activities in her free time?

capsules_submitted.utterance: Snape's affiliation with Hogwarts is definitely confirmed. I mean, he was the Potions master there for years, and his presence at the school is still remembered by many alumni. He may have had a bit of a complicated relationship with the students, but it's hard to deny his connection to the castle itself.
capsules_submitted.reply: this is news to me. i've never heard of hogwarts before, can you tell me more about it?

capsules_submitted.utterance: I'm really proud to say that I have an affiliation with the Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. It's such an amazing place, full of magic and wonder. I feel very certain about my connection to it, and I think it's a huge part of who I am as a witch.
